text:
Dominik Kalata, SJ, (19 May 1925 – 23 August 2018) was a Slovakian Roman Catholic prelate. He was a titular bishop of Semta. Kalata was ordained as a Catholic priest on August 12, 1951 and clandestinely as bishop in September 9, 1955. In March 16, 1985 he was appointed as titular bishop.
Kalata died on August 23, 2018 in Ivanka pri Dunaji, Slovakia from congestive heart failure, aged 93.
